title: Ecology and dreams
creator_credit: Roberto Salvatore and ACMI Content Development
brief_description: A dream for Lizzie and Shayne to make a difference in our world has become a reality in their little part of it. Together they have established the award-winning Cape Otway Centre for Conservation Ecology.
